price: Anyone who seeks a religion other than Islam, never will it be accepted from him; and in the Hereafter he will be among the losers.
arabic: وَمَن يَبۡتَغِ غَيۡرَ ٱلۡإِسۡلَٰمِ دِينٗا فَلَن يُقۡبَلَ مِنۡهُ وَهُوَ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ مِنَ ٱلۡخَٰسِرِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
